mapper.insert: insert into target (project_id, company_id, duration, start_date, end_date, quality, safety, cost, memo, cst_create, cst_modified) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safety,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cstCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cstModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select project_id, company_id, duration, start_date, end_date, quality, safety, cost, memo, cst_create, cst_modified from target where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.insert: insert into target (project_id, company_id, duration, start_date, end_date, quality, safety, cost, memo, cst_create, cst_modified) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safety,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now()) on duplicate key update duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, quality = #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safety = #{safety,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_modified = now()
